Ask, I'll answer almost every question

replies.body: What's it like being king of the forums?

replies.body: You always seem very eager to help in anything involving XML/YML. I haven't talked to you much, but you give to the community by helping tests maps on your server, and you're a pretty nice person in general. Sad that you're leaving though :(
replies.body_tagged: You always seem very eager to help in anything involving XML/YML. I haven't talked to you much, but you give to the community by helping tests maps on your server, and you're a pretty nice person in general. Sad that you're leaving though :(

replies.body:
I guess you mean flavour or something, but chocolate chip forever :)
Red apple
Uh, any normal car
B
Pepperoni and Cheese 
Pizza, Spaghetti and Nasi Lemak c:
I don't really have a favourite, but maybe root beer

You're an old player, heard from people that you were a nexus god or something. I wasn't around when you were active, so I pretty much never talked to you before. Also remember you got junior mod that one time if I'm not mistaken. You seem like a pretty good person based on what I've seen on the forums

replies.body: I kinda met you a while ago but never really talked. I fought a few 1v1s with you and that's really all. I watch your videos and you seem to play good for Apollo. Also used to talk to Zero about you for some reason lol. You wanted to know me better through MCZoners, though that isn't going to happen. Now that you've come back, I hope to know you more. Also, I'm always scared of you in-game, I don't know why

replies.body: You thought I was shit, immediate thumbs down. jk you're annoying af when you keep spamming "scrim" or "mega scrim", but besides that, you can be a great friend and funny sometimes. You're decent at the game and you're one of the people from OCN I respect. Also you need a mike noob, isn't Eric sending you one or something
replies.body_tagged: You thought I was shit, immediate thumbs down. jk you're annoying af when you keep spamming "scrim" or "mega scrim", but besides that, you can be a great friend and funny sometimes. You're decent at the game and you're one of the people from OCN I respect. Also you need a mike noob, isn't Eric sending you one or something

replies.body: When I first saw you in-game on Infernus after you got unbanned, I thought I saw a god, though you still are now xddd. You're a friendly and funny person who makes me laugh a lot. You like swearing a lot, though most of the time I'm able to tolerate. I don't really know if you consider me as a friend at all lol. You used to complain about Avicus kb, of course now you don't, gotten better at the game too
replies.body_tagged: When I first saw you in-game on Infernus after you got unbanned, I thought I saw a god, though you still are now xddd. You used to complain about Avicus kb, of course now you don't, gotten better at the game too

replies.body:
Though it was a while ago, I kinda get bothered when you ignore my hi. Of course now I don't really care anymore. I tried to know you better but I never really gotten the chance. All I know is that you were once a senior mod and that's pretty much all. You've improved at the sword too, from what I've observed.

No I won't, and never will unless I have some special reason to

I've been getting more busy in real life, I'm kinda playing less and for some reason avoiding people on teamspeak. Maybe due to some self-confidence issues, idk

No, I only wear socks to school or when I'm wearing my shoes.

replies.body: You're another fellow Singaporean, which is cool. You're also an old guy and friend, though you randomly disappeared and I forgot about you for a while. Then I saw you on OCN and then you got unbanned and here we are. You're good at PvP for your ping too :)))))

replies.body:
You can be annoying sometimes, but when you're not, you can be really nice to talk to. You've improved a lot in your sword too, though it's sad you get rejected out of pretty much every team. You need to know how to listen, from I heard.

Rate you in terms of?

I know the Dutch people like orange for some reason, other than that I know nothing else. I want to go there though :P
